Keyboard shortcuts for Apex Legends

A visual cheat-sheet for the 27 default keyboard shortcuts found in Apex Legends

Original Reference Report Issue

Movement

Move forward

  • W

Move back

  • S

Move left

  • A

Move right

  • D

Sprint

  • Left Shift

Jump

  • Space

Toggle crouch

  • C

Hold to crouch

  • Left Ctrl

Weapons and Abilities

Tactical ability

  • Q

Ultimate ability

  • Z

Interact or pickup

  • E

Alternate interact

  • X

Toggle inventory

  • Tab

Toggle map

  • M

Toggle fire mode

  • B

Melee

  • V

Reload

  • R

Equip first weapon

  • 1

Equip second weapon

  • 2

Holster weapons

  • 3

Equip grenade

  • G

Use selected health item

  • 4

Toggle Gibraltar's shield

  • H

Inspect weapon

  • N

Communication

Ping enemy here

  • F

Hold to use push to talk

  • T

Message team

  • Enter
